resources.string: How does the app help to manage your financial goals?

This app helps you to categorize your goals and budget which is allocated to each goal without need to have different saving accounts. The idea is having your saving amount in one account and getting them separated virtually by the app. you can enter all of your financial goals in the app by defining new goals and specify the amount which in needed for each goal to be achieved and the deadline as well. and finally in the app you can find your saved mony categorized based on your personal decision. So you do not have to save the money for each goal separately.
How can I edit goals or transactions I submitted?
You can Easily tap and long press any goal or transaction to edit every single details or delete it.
Hi! No goal has been set yet, You can add your goals by pressing add button on top right of the app
We truely appreciate your valuable feedbacks.
